title: WTB T206 Dahlen Brooklyn G or a bit better, Randall SC
author: FrankWakefield

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Dahlen Brooklyn G or a bit better, Randall SC
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for a T206 Randall, Sweet Caporal, G to almost Ex, and doesn't matter if it's graded or not.

     I had been looking for a T206 of Bill Dahlen, Brooklyn, but I've now found one.

PLEASE email me at [url]yeswakefield@gmail.com[/url]... messaging through the board for me is problematic. Please send a scan of front and back.

Thank you for taking time to read this, and Thanks in advance if you can help me find a Sweet Caporal card of Randall.

Frank Wakefield
